column1: Drank a bowl of soup in Robart Library at noon which caused your stomach discomfort and cost 300 Tbucks to see a doctor.
You accidentally spilled coffee on your computer during class and need to spend 500 Tbucks to repair it.
oops! There is a homeless man who has been following you, you speed up your footsteps forward 5 blocks to get rid of him.
You were playing games last night and missed the important assignment deadline, 3 blocks back.
Met a snowstorm can not leave, stop a round.
